document.full_text: cubans mostly welcomed president raul castro's call at a communist party congress this weekend to limit the terms of island leaders, saying on sunday it would bring new blood to the government the castros and their aging colleagues have ruled for 52 years.
document.title: cubans welcome castro call to limit leaders' terms
lines_and_colors: cubans mostly welcomed president raul castro's call at a communist party congress this weekend to limit the terms of island leaders, saying on sunday it would bring new blood to the government the castros and their aging colleagues have ruled for 52 years.
